bgibbons.game.level.tiles

Class AnimatedTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.Tile
      • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.BaseTile
        • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.AnimatedTile

  • public class AnimatedTile
extends BaseTile
    An extension of the BaseTile class for animated tiles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedTile

        public AnimatedTile(int id,
                    int[][] animationCoords,
                    int tileColor,
                    int levelColor,
                    int animationSwitchDelay)
        Constructor for the AnimatedTile object.
        Parameters:
        id - The Id of the tile to be rendered.
        animationCoords - The coordinates of the different animation states.
        tileColor - Color obtained from the Color.get(int, int, int, int) function.
        levelColor - Integer value of the color from the level resource to render the specific tile.
        animationSwitchDelay - The delay in milisecond to switch the animation of the tile.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Ticks the tile to switch current animation state.

        tick in class BaseTile
